experience.title: experience
experience.description:
• Developed and deployed machine learning models and RAG-based chatbots on Azure OpenAI and its services using Python, MSSQL and Fast API, elevating enterprise digital capabilities.

• Engineered secure, end-to-end ETL pipelines and big data workflows across Azure environments, supporting large-scale anomaly detection in financial transactions.

• Analyzed Gravitational Wave signals at IUCAA-LIGO using unsupervised learning and neural networks (CNN, LSTM).

• Enhanced real-time video privacy at DRDO by developing DL-driven object detection pipelines using YOLOv8 and OpenCV.

• Led a team to secure 3rd position in BNY Mellon Hackathon with a customer complaints classification system.

hard-skills.title: hard-skills
hard-skills.description:
• Languages/Packages: Python (TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn, Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib, OpenCV)

• Technologies/Tools: Linux, GitHub, MS Excel, PowerBI, AWS, Azure, Jira

• Databases: MSSQL, PostgreSQL, Azure SQL

• Core Skills: Machine Learning, Deep Learning, NLP, Large Language Models (LLMs), Gen AI, Cloud Security, ETL Pipeline Development

• Cloud Platforms: Azure (OpenAI, Machine Learning), AWS

soft-skills.title: soft-skills
soft-skills.description:
• Leadership: Led AiSA team of 70 members and hackathon teams

• Communication: Effectively presented technical solutions to stakeholders

• Problem-Solving: Demonstrated through hackathon wins and complex project implementations

• Team Collaboration: Successfully worked across cross-functional teams in enterprise environments

• Project Management: Managed end-to-end delivery of AI solutions with Agile methodologies

bio.title: bio
bio.description: I am an Data Scientist with hands-on experience in building end-to-end AI solutions—from RAG chatbots to anomaly detection models—and scaling them on Azure & AWS with secure ETL pipelines. With a CGPA of 9.23 in B.Tech (AI & DS), I bring strong foundations in ML, Deep Learning, and Cloud Security while driving impact through real-world projects at KNAV India, IUCAA (LIGO Project), and DRDO. My journey includes leading teams, winning hackathons, and delivering data-driven innovations that blend technical expertise with business outcomes.

Vishwakarma Institute of Information Technology, Pune
B.Tech in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
CGPA: 9.23 | Nov. 2021 – May 2025

Key Coursework:
• Gen AI & Large Language Models
• Natural Language Processing
• Deep Learning & Neural Networks

1.title: _privacy_management
1.description: Enhanced real-time video privacy using YOLOv8 and OpenCV, achieving 90% accuracy in masking sensitive regions. Designed Python GUI for ML model integration, reducing configuration time by 40%.

2.title: _customer_complaints
2.description: Built ML-based complaint classification system using Naive Bayes (88% accuracy) and SVM. Engineered text processing pipelines using TF-IDF vectorization for analyzing 10,000+ banking complaints.

3.title: _machine_failure
3.description: Developed ML model using Random Forest Classifier (94% accuracy) to predict machine failures. Used SMOTE oversampling for handling class imbalance in rare failure predictions.
